anya-e1208n0:281: Tathā na sevetha na tassa doso;
anya-e1208n0:284: Na tassa doso na sukhaṃ vajeyya,
anya-e1208n0:289: Na tassa doso ta labhe tikicchaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:476: Medhāya nando thiravāci kheme; (Kavināma gabbha cakkaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:479: Dāyato vasato na’nusantāsassa hitesino; (Gāthaddhavisaya paṭiloma yamakaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:482: Sakāyanā’nāya’kāsa vāma nā ga ganā’mavā; (Sabbato bhadda bandhanaṃ)
anya-e1208n0:491: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedhabrāhmaṇāpadānaparidīpo.
anya-e1208n0:504: Sambuddho so itipi arahaṃ tyādinā’bbhuggataṃ taṃ,
anya-e1208n0:518: Abbhuggantvā atha himavatā so sumedho tapassi
anya-e1208n0:519: Gacchaṃ tesaṃ upari nabhasā vākacīraṃ dhunanno,
anya-e1208n0:536: Sajjetuṃ te sapadi muditā sādhavo tassa’daṃsu; ()
anya-e1208n0:566: Sambuddhoyaṃ vajatu iti me dīgharattaṃ hitāya; ()
anya-e1208n0:573: Sutvā gāthāpadampi na me bhāriyaṃ saṃkilese
anya-e1208n0:596: Patvā bodhiṃ ahamiva siyā gotamo nāma buddho; ()
anya-e1208n0:598: Tumhe sampassatha iti imaṃ tāpasaṃ saṅghamajjhe
anya-e1208n0:605: Bimbā bimbā dharavati piyā hema bimbā bhirāmā
anya-e1208n0:613: Assattho te vijayaviṭapī tvañca kho gotamavho
anya-e1208n0:615: Pāyāsaggaṃ parivisiya bho tvaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ
anya-e1208n0:616: Bodhiṃ bujjhissasi iti dhuvaṃ bodhimūle nisajja; ()
anya-e1208n0:633: Rammaṃ rammaṃ mahīya jaṭilaṃ pupphamuṭṭhīhi katvā
anya-e1208n0:638: Tamhā ṭhānā gatasati jane sannisinnassa tassa
anya-e1208n0:651: Āvajjesi kati iti sudhī dhammadhātuṃ sahetuṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:656: Nibbinno mā bhavi’ti paṭhamaṃ pāramiṃ’dhiṭṭhahi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:671: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi tvamiti matimā pāramiṃ so catutthiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:694: Sītattaṃ sampharati hi samaṃ vārinā bhāvayeni,
anya-e1208n0:696: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi samuti navamiṃ pāramiṃ metta citto; ()
anya-e1208n0:699: Majjhattā’yaṃ vasumativadhū hoti dukkhe sukheka vā,
anya-e1208n0:700: Evaṃ bho tvaṃ bhava samatulāsantibho’pekkha ko’ti
anya-e1208n0:713: Nikkaṅkhā te punapi nagarā nāgarā taṃ upecca
anya-e1208n0:718: Mā te rogo bhavi paṭibhayaṃ mā bhavi chambhitattaṃ
anya-e1208n0:724: Bodhātvo himavati sakaṃ assamaṃ tāpaso so,
anya-e1208n0:742: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jitavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedha tāpasassa mūlapaṇiṭhānaṭṭhapanapavatti paridīpo dutiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1037: Dve sīvali ñca samaṇīsu varā surāmā; ()
anya-e1208n0:1203: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatitā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne bodhisattassa sesapaṇidhātaṭṭhapana pavatti paridīpo tatiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1333: Pabbajjituṃ sapariso pavanaṃ jagāma; () (Soṇapaṇḍitacariyaṃ; Iti nekkhamma pārami;)
anya-e1208n0:1343: Paññāpajāpatipati riputo mumoca; () (Mahosadhacariyaṃ iti paññā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1363: Khantiṃ pavattayi manappitakhantimetto; () (Dhammapāla cariyaṃ; Iti khantipāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1398: Daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhitavataṃ vata nojahāsi; () (Temiyacariyaṃ; Iti adhiṭṭhāna pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1408: Mettāya samphari samaṃ paribhāvitāya; () (Ekarājacariyaṃ; Iti mettā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n0:1413: Veraṃ averamanupecca rarakkhu’pekkhaṃ; () (Lomahaṃsacariyaṃ; Iti upekkhāka pakāramiṃ)
anya-e1208n0:1454: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne pāramidhammābhisaṅkharaṇa pavatti paridīpo catuttho saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1498: Nisajjo paripāsāde so rājā ekadā raho,
anya-e1208n0:1586: Yasmā akālo buddhānaṃ tasmā kālaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1589: Jāyanti jambudīpasmiṃ tasmā dīpaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1592: Jāyare majjhime dese tasmādesaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1595: Khantiye brāhmaṇe buddhā kulaṃ tasmā vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n0:1607: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānatidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne vessantaracariyappabhutidevārādhanā pavatti paridīpo pañcamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:1891: Rañño kathesi supinaṃ atha so narindo,
anya-e1208n0:2109: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne pacchimabhavika mahābodhi sattuppatti pavattiparidīpo chaṭṭhosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:2359: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandananidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne vividhapubbanimittapātubhāvappavatti paridipo. Sattamosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:2899: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇa kumārasambharaṇādi pavatti paridipo aṭṭhamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:3150: Iti mbedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne pāṇiggahamaṅakgalussavapavattiparidīpo. Navamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:3330: Yathariva gaṇikaṃ taṃ kañjaniṃ so janindo
anya-e1208n0:3390: Iti varamati sutvā tāya gāthaṃ sugītaṃ
anya-e1208n0:3485: Alamiti mama vāso handa nikkhamma tamhā
anya-e1208n0:3574: Savisamiva pibanto taṃ tuvaṃ ko’si pucchi,
anya-e1208n0:3630: Nabhasi khipi sikhaṃ taṃ iccadhiṭṭhāya dhīro
anya-e1208n0:3667: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre nidāne mahābhinikkhamana pavattiparidīpo dasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:3824: Nā go siyā paṭhaminimujjanaṃ ka re
anya-e1208n0:3856: Mā kāhase sakha iti dukkaraṃ kharaṃ
anya-e1208n0:3977: Vāsaṃ akā vasi mukhato ca nāsato
anya-e1208n0:4223: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hakayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne mahābodhisattassa mahā padhānānuyogappavattiparidīpo ekādasamosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:4739: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavakijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre nidāne devaputta mārabala viddhaṃsana pavattiparidīpo dvādasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:4990: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne pubbenivāsañāṇadibbacakkhuñāṇādhigama pavattiparidīpo terasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:5241_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe
anya-e1208n0:5241_1: avidure nidāne mahā bodhisattassa ariyamaggañāṇābhisambodhi samadhigama pavattiparidīpo cuddasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:5451: Kiṃ tāta kiṃ tāta kimettha jhāyasi
anya-e1208n0:5452: Ko te paro kena parājito tuvaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5461: Dassāma vo passatha tāta no balaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5553: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato sattasattāhavitikkamappavatti paridīpo paṇṇarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:5556: Vikkhāletvā bhagavati mukhaṃ tasmiṃ nisinne sati,
anya-e1208n0:5557: Vāṇijjatthaṃ nija janapadā dve bhātikāka vāṇijā
anya-e1208n0:5562: Bhante tumhe anubhavatha no bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n0:5565: Sabbe buddhā nahi karatalambhojesu gaṇhanti kho
anya-e1208n0:5570: Ekaṃ katvā samuti caturo patte adhiṭṭhāya te
anya-e1208n0:5580: Patvā tesaṃ janapadamubho pakkhippa tā dhātuyo
anya-e1208n0:5591: Deseyyaṃ kho paṭhamamasamaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ duddasaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5602: Ācikkhitvā vimati matarī saññāya taṃ dūrato
anya-e1208n0:5603: Nibbinditvā katika makaruṃ vaggā samaggā vasī; ()
anya-e1208n0:5605: Ñatvā tesaṃ manasi vikatiṃ odissakaṃ samphari
anya-e1208n0:5606: Mettaṃ cittaṃ narahari tato phuṭṭhāsamānā vasī,
anya-e1208n0:5633: Vassāna’nte pahiṇi muni te bhikkhu disācārikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5648: Rañño vācaṃ sumariya puraṃ rājaggahaṃ pāvisi; ()
anya-e1208n0:5655: Bhetvā diṭṭhiṃ ciraparicitaṃ te kassapādī vasī
anya-e1208n0:5656: Disvā rājā bhagavati tadā dhammaṃcarante tahiṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5671: Uṇhākāraṃ janayi’ti tadā hutvā navo māṇavo,
anya-e1208n0:5690: Āramaṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ satthā paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n0:5692: Tasmiṃ kāle paramamamataṃ ye daḷhamittā ubho
anya-e1208n0:5708: Sutvā dhammaṃ adhigami vasī taṃ dhammasenāpatī; ()
anya-e1208n0:5710: Dhammassāmī karahaci ubho te sāvakānaṃ mamaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5711: Aggaṃ bhaddaṃ yugamiti ime pabyākarotto munī,
anya-e1208n0:5716: Buddho hutvā padahiya ciraṃ nissāya rājaggahaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:5737: Evaṃ vatvā kapuna saparisaṃ sokāphadāyiṃ tahiṃ
anya-e1208n0:5751: Gantuṃ kālo’yamiti adhunā so kāludāyi vasī,
anya-e1208n0:5758: Sāyaṃka pāto ahani vivaṭā sabbādisā pākaṭā; ()
anya-e1208n0:5763: Dāvaggī te lavamapi manotāpāya vattanti kiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5787: Haṃsasseṇika sirasi vajato te bhuyate kiṅkiṇi-
anya-e1208n0:5801: Jiṇṇo vuddho mamihapahiṇi tvaṃ daṭṭhukāmo pitā,
anya-e1208n0:5815: Taṃ bhuñjanto divasadivase so yojanaṃ yojanaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5820: Nānuppatte bhagavati puraṃ no ñātiseṭṭhaṃ kuhiṃ
anya-e1208n0:5833: Nissoko so muni parihari sokandhakāraṃ pitu; ()
anya-e1208n0:5838: Tumhegantvā paṇamatha jinaṃ vo piṭṭhitāhomै no; ()
anya-e1208n0:5858: Vassaṃ vassi nijanakharuciṃ tesaṃ samāje sati; ()
anya-e1208n0:5892: Gantvā sīghaṃ khaḷitavacatā putto mahārāja te
anya-e1208n0:5910: Uttiṭṭhādiṃ avadi kasugamaṃ gāthaṃ ṭhito vīthiyaṃ
anya-e1208n0:5926: Rājā saṅghaṃ sugatapamukhaṃ khajjena bhojjena ca,
anya-e1208n0:5938: Taṃ kamaṃ daṭṭhuṃ nanupavisatī’tve’vaṃ vadantī ṭhitā; ()
anya-e1208n0:5966: Sīghaṃ jālaṃ vivariya thiyā vīthiṃ vilokentiyā,
anya-e1208n0:5968: Pattaṃ bhante haratha vacanaṃ bhatyā na taṃ vyākari; ()
anya-e1208n0:5983: Eso tuyhaṃ naraharika pitā iccākaha pakassāhi naṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5988: Yācassū’ti pahiṇi pituno ñattaṃ dhanaṃ pettikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:5995: Dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dadataṃ atthodhanenā’ti me
anya-e1208n0:6012: Sutvā kasuttaṃ puna taditaraṃ sikkhāgarūnaṃ garu-
anya-e1208n0:6020: Rañño datvā varamati varaṃ bhuttāsano āsanā-
anya-e1208n0:6040: Buddhatthaṃ so gahapati mahāmagge samagge divā-
anya-e1208n0:6052: Tesaṃ sīsaharañjalihi mahito sutvāna taṃ sāsanaṃ
anya-e1208n0:6054: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato pakiṇṇaka caritappavatti paridīpo soḷasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:6292: Yo sadātiya sadā kama taṃ sadā,
anya-e1208n0:6304: Vanī janaṃ jetavane vinento; () (Caturakkharika citta yamakaṃ;)
anya-e1208n0:6305: Iti medhānandābhidhānanayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne jetavana vihārālaṅkāra paridīpo sattarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:6724: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne pañjavidhabuddhakicca paridīpo aṭṭhārasamoka saggo.
anya-e1208n0:6839: Yatana cha phassa cha vedanāti ceko; ()
anya-e1208n0:6975: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato arahantināmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekūnavīsatimoka saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7071_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe
anya-e1208n0:7071_1: santikeka nidāne bhagavato kasammāsambuddhoti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo vīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7505_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe
anya-e1208n0:7505_1: santike nidāne bhagavato vijjācaraṇa sampannoti nāmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7506: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā sugatoti.
anya-e1208n0:7812: Tena so bhuvanattaye sugato siyāti suvissuto; ()
anya-e1208n0:7817: Nātho sammā gato tato so sugato; ()
anya-e1208n0:7818: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatināna viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato sutagoti paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo. Bāvīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:7819: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato. Itipiso bhagavā lokavidūti.
anya-e1208n0:7970: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavatolokavidūti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo tevīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:7971: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti.
anya-e1208n0:8127_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā varacite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe
anya-e1208n0:8127_1: santikenidāne bhagavato anuttaro purisadammasārathīti nāma paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo catubbīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n0:8128: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇekitti saddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā satthā devamanussānaṃti.
anya-e1208n0:8142: Sabrahmaṃ sanarāmaraṃ sasamaṇaṃ sabrāhmaṇaṃ yohi so
anya-e1208n0:8147: Sattānaṃ tasasate vihiṃsati dhiyā siddhatthasāro tato
anya-e1208n0:8154: Taṃkho panabhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃkalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipiso bhagavā buddhoti.
anya-e1208n0:8159: Patto ñāṇabalesu pāpuṇi vasībhāvaṃ sayamabhuka sayaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:8161: Bodhetā’ti pajāya nibbacanato saccāni so bujjhitā
anya-e1208n0:8163: Matyā bujjhanasattiyā mahatiyā yasmā samaṅakgī tato
anya-e1208n0:8178: Buddhambhojatibhānano hī bhagavā sāmaṃ pabuddho yato
anya-e1208n0:8200_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe
anya-e1208n0:8200_1: santikenidāne satthādevamanussānaṃ buddhoti nāmapaññattīnaṃ abhidheya paridīpo pañcavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:8201: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā bhagavāti.
anya-e1208n0:8446: Na devatāhi ca nana yena kenaci racitaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:8639: Mataṃ so pibanto vamī te ca bhāge; ()
anya-e1208n0:8705: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavā’tināmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo chabbīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:8780: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāte navannamarahādiguṇānaṃ saṅkhepanayaparidīpo
anya-e1208n0:9090: Na ca taṃ paṭivijjhi neva yāci
anya-e1208n0:9123: Appossukko samāno viharatu kalimā ho timāsaccayena
anya-e1208n0:9131: Loko sokandhakāre paripati janito bhiṃsano lomahaṃso; ()
anya-e1208n0:9132: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato āyusaṅkhārossajjana pavatti paridīpo aṭṭhavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:9134: Yenā’nando vasati bhagavā tena gantvā nisinno
anya-e1208n0:9136: Bhante sukkhāsati ca elitā hiṃsano lomahaṃso
anya-e1208n0:9149: Gabbhokkanto bhacati ca yadā sampajāno satova
anya-e1208n0:9152: Ete dhammā samaṇa mahato bhumicālassa hetu; ()
anya-e1208n0:9169: Apposasukekā tvamiha kalimā hohi māsehi tīhi
anya-e1208n0:9179: Sambodhiṃ tvaṃ yadi bhagavato saddahanto’si kasmā
anya-e1208n0:9181: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sati bhagavatā ka yamāne nimitte
anya-e1208n0:9184: Yāceyyāsi yadi dasabalaṃ ce paṭikkhippa vācā
anya-e1208n0:9186: Naṇvā’kkhāto samaṇa paṭigacceva me saṅkhataṃ yaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9187: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ avipariṇataṃ taṃ kuto’ pe’ttha labbhā; ()
anya-e1208n0:9191: Yāsā vācā yathariva chiyāmuttakhāṇo tathā taṃ
anya-e1208n0:9205: Yete dhammā sayamadhigatā desitā sādhukaṃ vo,
anya-e1208n0:9222: Oloketvā ida mavaca me pacchimaṃ dassana’nti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9229: Tisso sikkhā pariharatha vo sādhukaṃ bhikkhave’ti
anya-e1208n0:9239: Eso dhammo bhavati vinayo sāsanaṃ satthu cedaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9240: Abbhaññātaṃ vata bhagavato sammukhā me sutanti,
anya-e1208n0:9241: Sakkhīkatvā yadi vadati maṃ bhikkhave koci bhikkhu
anya-e1208n0:9252: Yvābhiññāto paṭibalataro bhikkhu vā sammukhā me
anya-e1208n0:9296: Yaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ narahari tahiṃ vissamatto nisajja,
anya-e1208n0:9307: Sakkā bhante savati kakudhāsindhu gattāni sīkiṃ
anya-e1208n0:9310: Evaṃ vutte puna bhagavatā codito pattahattho
anya-e1208n0:9328: Datvā buddhaṃ saraṇa magamā sāṭakaṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n0:9341: Dve me laddhā samasamaphalā piṇḍapātā visiṭṭhā,
anya-e1208n0:9343: Sse’vaṃ vatvā pariharatu tañcāha me accayena; ()
anya-e1208n0:9372: Yo kho dhammaṃ carati samaṇo’ pāsako vā’nudhammaṃ
anya-e1208n0:9373: Bhatyā so maṃ paramavidhānā kamānaye pūjayeti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9385: Kandantīnaṃ pakiriya sake kesapāse ca bāhā
anya-e1208n0:9426: Theraṃ mākhovilapi ala mānanda māsoci hevaṃ,
anya-e1208n0:9433: Ātāpī so tvamasi nipapako hesi khīṇāsavoti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9451: Rājā hutvā cira manubhaviṃ dhammiko dhammarājā,
anya-e1208n0:9462: Uyyānaṃ te pavisiya tadā mallaputtā ca mallā
anya-e1208n0:9475: Okāsaṃ me dadatha samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchanāya
anya-e1208n0:9477: Vutte satthā kilamati alaṃhāvuso mā vihaññi
anya-e1208n0:9490: Paññatto yo bhavati vinayo desito yoca dhammo
anya-e1208n0:9491: So vo satthā paramasaraṇo’tyā’ha me accayena,
anya-e1208n0:9495: Paccakkho no bhavi dasabalo pucchituṃ sammukhā taṃ
anya-e1208n0:9498: Saṅghe magge vimati yadivo bhikkhave pucchathāti; ()
anya-e1208n0:9500: Yasmā khandhe pajahati jino bhikkhave bhandadāni
anya-e1208n0:9510: Taṃ taṃ jhānaṃ muni paṭisamāpajjamāno nirodhā
anya-e1208n0:9534: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne tathāgata parinibbānappavatti paridīpo ekūnatiṃsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n0:9535: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā brahmāsahampati imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9539: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānāsakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9542: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā anuruddho imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9547: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā ānando imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n0:9827: Bhatyā punappuna mimaṃ sarataṃ sataṃ bho,
anya-e1208n0:9905: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato dhātuparinibbānappavattiparidīpo tiṃsatimosaggo.
